Class nl.ru.bcigames.ServerWrapper.Publisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.ru.bcigames.ServerWrapper.Publisher

  • public class nl.ru.bcigames.ServerWrapper.Publisher
extends java.lang.Object
    The nl.ru.bcigames.serverwrapper.Publisher is a class which handles everything needed to push events to the server
